overview: After going out on a string of bad dates, Charlotte Sins finds love at home with best friend Alina Lopez. Feuding roommates Ember Snow and Milana Ricci agree to make love not war for the duration of their apartment lease. Hookup Jane Wilde fears she's overstayed her welcome until Kuleana gets her back into bed. Mila Monet convinces Vanessa Sky to sleep with her to piss off her ex. Girls lovin girls is always trouble...hot, sexy trouble!
title: Girls Lovin' Girls 2
